As a Mental Health and Substance Abuse Social Workers with Professional Degree, your work involves assess and treat individuals with mental, emotional, or substance abuse problems, including abuse of alcohol, tobacco, and/or other drugs. activities may include individual and group therapy, crisis intervention, case management, client advocacy, prevention, and education.
